content.rendered:
Happy New Year from Gottwals!

 

Thank You for a Wonderful 2014!

We have had an exceptional year and we want to thank our dedicated readers! We currently have four corporate-owned stores and three franchises. And, we are growing! Our warehouse has allowed us to streamline our processes and open more stores. Thank you for your continued support.

Looking Forward to an Exciting 2015!

We will open two new stores in January 2015! The new Walls of Books in Zanesville, Ohio, will open on January 10. Stay tuned for an exciting announcement regarding the opening of the second store location in January!

excerpt.rendered: We have had an exceptional year and we want to thank our dedicated readers!
